name: Stabby Knight in Autumn Land
description:
Stabby Knight in Autumn Land

In this game you play as a small knight traversing a mountain in autumn. Move using arrow keys/d-pad and interact with signs using z/east gamepad button. The signs will teach you the rest.

Programming/Level Design/Art/Animation/Sound Design : Oliver Beebe

Sound effects made using Chiptone by SFBGames - https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
Wind ambience from freesound.org
